snippet: Amid the Wall Street excitement over Facebook’s planned initial public offering, it may be a good time to take a look at I.P.O. history.
abstract: Jeff Sommer Strategies column opines that amid the Wall Street excitement over Facebook’s planned initial public offering, it may be a good time to take a look at IPO history, which is long, colorful and consequential; holds that unless an investor is lucky enough to get the opening price, IPOs usually are not a great deal.
lead_paragraph: Amid the Wall Street excitement over Facebook’s planned initial public offering, it may be a good time to take a look at I.P.O. history.

headline.seo: I.P.O. Euphoria, Without Much Memory — Strategies
